item.title: The good, the bad, and the meshy: a journey adopting Istio across 100 clusters at T-Mobile
item.description: This is a story of struggle, tradeoffs, and triumphs. Istio, as you may know, is a mission-critical piece of software for securing and connecting microservices across platforms. However, it can be daunting to introduce, operationalize, or adopt it successfully. In this talk, we dig into T-Mobileâ€™s journey of adopting Istio across 100+ clusters to support microservices for fraud detection, billing, sales and APIs across many teams. The journey was not all rainbows and unicorns.
